SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, claim_type_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id FROM elp_dealer_clm_aprove_clmtype WHERE dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id = :dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_DEALERID_CLAIMTYPEID: SELECT dealer_id, claim_type_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id FROM elp_dealer_clm_aprove_clmtype WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id and claim_type_id = :claim_type_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_dealer_clm_aprove_clmtype SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, claim_type_id = :claim_type_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id = :dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_dealer_clm_aprove_clmtype ( dealer_id, claim_type_id, created_by, dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :claim_type_id, :created_by, :dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id )
